'''Wanyu''' (Chinese: 琬玉 ''Wǎnyù'') is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in Act II of the [[Historia Antiqua Chapter]]. She is the Head of Human Culture and Civilization Research at [[Shenglu Hall]].
